mapper.sql: ID, ENTRYNUM, ENTRYDATE, DELIVERYCOMPANY, CLIENT, CARNUM, OPERATOR_, STORAGELOCATIONID, PRODUCINGYEAR, PRODUCINGAREA
mapper.insert: insert into RAWENTRY (ID, ENTRYNUM, ENTRYDATE, DELIVERYCOMPANY, CLIENT, CARNUM, OPERATOR_, STORAGELOCATIONID, PRODUCINGYEAR, PRODUCINGAREA) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{entrynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entrydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliverycompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{client,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{carnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{storagelocationid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{producingyear,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{producingarea,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
